title: Tamara Ecclestone joins husband Jay Rutland at swanky art gallery event
text:
She never fails to turn heads with her sensational sense of style.

And Tamara Ecclestone cut a glamorous figure as she joined her husband Jay Rutland at the David Yarrow Pride Rock VIP preview at the Maddox Gallery in London on Thursday.

The billionaire heiress, 35, looked stunning in a black long-sleeved mini-dress with a purple floral print.

Couple: Tamara Ecclestone, 35, cut a glamorous figure as she joined her husband Jay Rutland, 38, at the David Yarrow Pride Rock VIP preview at the Maddox Gallery in London on Thursday

Displaying her lithe physique, Tamara added height to her frame with a pair of black heels while she styled her blonde locks into loose waves for the evening.

Jay looked dapper for the event in a navy blazer with a matching jumper and dark trousers, completing his look with brown shoes.

The pair looked every inch the happy couple at the event and held hands as they made their way home.

Tamara married her husband Jay in 2013 after a six month whirlwind romance, and gave birth to their beloved daughter Fifi just a year later.

Fashion: The billionaire heiress, 35, looked stunning in a black long-sleeved mini-dress with a purple floral print

The stunning star previously spoke exclusively to MailOnline about life in the Ecclestone-Rutland household with daughter Fifi and her gallery owner husband Jay Rutland.

She discussed her beloved daughter and her decision to breastfeed her until recently - which has caused controversy in the past.

She said: 'The first time it happened we were breastfeeding on the beach with no one around and I said to Jay take a picture and there was this huge uproar and people fighting and getting aggressive about a picture!

Looking good: Displaying her lithe physique, Tamara added height to her frame with a pair of black heels while she styled her blonde locks into loose waves for the evening

Suave: Jay looked dapper for the event in a navy blazer with a matching jumper and dark trousers, completing his look with brown shoes

Relationship: Tamara married her husband Jay in 2013 after a six month whirlwind romance, and gave birth to their beloved daughter Fifi just a year later

Loved-up: The pair looked every inch the happy couple as they made their way home after the swanky event

Interview: Tamara previously discussed her beloved daughter and her decision to breastfeed her until recently - which has caused controversy in the past

'When that happened I knew every time I did this it would happen but I was not going to let that stop me so I continued...

'There was such a circus around it so I thought... let me use this platform.

'People messaged me saying I gave them confidence to stand up to people asking them to stop and people came up to me and told me their stories.'
